titleStmt.title: The helpe and grace of almighty god ...
Festial
titleStmt.author: Mirk, John, fl. 1403?

notesStmt.note: Signatures: a-d e-h i-m n⁴ A-C.
Title from opening words of text.
In two parts; part 1 ends on n4.
Printer's name from part 2 colophon; place and date of publication from STC.
Printer's device (McKerrow 3) on verso of C8, final page.
Another edition of STC 17957, published in Westminster by William Caxton, 1483.
Reproduction of original in the Pepys Library.
